backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no exposed logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten one‑sentence summaries for many frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and global theme tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading SheetJS and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app managing upload flow, department filtering, semester selection, and view switching.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleBar: SVG bar chart that auto-adjusts width, supports horizontal scrolling, and labels bars.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimpleLin: SVG line chart with grid lines, point markers, and percentage labels.
frontend/src/components/charts/SimplePie: SVG pie chart generating arc paths and rendering a legend with percentage labels.
frontend/src/features/comparison/Semeste: Renders semester-to-semester analytics with line charts for pass and failure trends plus a detailed comparison table.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/BacklogD: Displays backlog groups with collapsible lists of students and allows selecting roll numbers from each group.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Semester: Main semester dashboard combining charts, subject analysis, backlog distribution, student lookup, and filtering by semester and department.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentD: Shows a detailed data sheet for a selected student, including subjects, marks, and status, or a not-found message.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/StudentR: Enables searching students by roll number with department-aware matching and displays results or warnings.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/SubjectA: Lists subjects sorted by backlog count and provides failed student selection for each subject.
frontend/src/features/upload/UploadScree: React component providing drag‑and‑drop and manual file upload, parses Excel files and forwards parsed data upward.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identity loading, and auth-client lifecycle.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file reserved for future React Query hooks with no current logic.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and global styling.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/backlogDistri: Computes groups of students by backlog count, returning sorted counts and roll numbers.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/computeSemest: Generates per‑semester analytics including pass rates, backlog totals, and subject-wise backlog counts.
frontend/src/lib/analytics/subjectFailur: Builds a map of subject codes to sorted lists of students who failed those subjects.
frontend/src/lib/excel/parseExcelFile.ts: Reads and parses Excel files using XLSX, detects data format, and produces structured ParsedData.
frontend/src/lib/format/numberFormat.ts: Utility functions for number, percentage, and decimal formatting with safety checks.
frontend/src/lib/format/subjectAbbreviat: Derives subject abbreviations and formats subject codes using a catalog lookup.
frontend/src/lib/guards/assertions.ts: Runtime assertion helpers for defined values, non‑empty arrays, and numeric validation.
frontend/src/lib/state/appFlowTypes.ts: Shared type definitions for student records, parsed data, and semester analytics.
frontend/src/lib/students/lookupStudentR: Provides a case‑insensitive lookup function that returns all student records matching a roll number.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, themes, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, current issues, and pending feature requests for the Academic Result Analytics app.
